snippet: The team is hoping to break ground on a new stadium in Santa Clara, Calif., across the street from its training facility.
abstract: The team is hoping to break ground on a new stadium in Santa Clara, Calif., across the street from its training facility.
lead_paragraph: INDIANAPOLIS -- N.F.L. owners, in a brief meeting here Thursday, approved a $200 million loan for the San Francisco 49ers, who hope to soon break ground in Santa Clara, Calif., on a replacement for Candlestick Park.
